title: Harlequin
creator_credit: FG Films, Far Flight, Antony Ginnane and Simon Wincer
brief_description: An influential politician and his wife fall prey to a man who saves the life of their son. He is a hypnotic faith healer called Wolf “The Harlequin” and his powers of manipulation are strong. A chief political adviser to the the politican attempts to remove “The Harlequin” and lessen his power but is confronted by a being with strong supernnatural powers. The climax is filled with unbelievable tension and terror. Starring David Hemmings, Robert Powell, Broderick Crawford and Carmen Duncan.
